title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on the Future of Work
purpose: To advance (i) understanding and discussion about the impacts of technology on work and society (ii) dialogue and collaboration between government, business, unions, academics and civil society and (iii) practical solutions in response to key challenges and opportunities aimed at shaping a future of better work across the UK.
